name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 ＂Spectra of Nova＂【おおきにアリーナ舞洲】 [Q1s4w-_ujig]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei performing 'By My Side' at her live tour.
MC section transition with audience interaction and song intro.

subtitles.original: 踊りこなしていくんだ 透明で 鮮明で
subtitles.english: Dancing through it all, transparent and clear,

subtitles.original: 叫び声上げる 舞い戻る 手に触れる
subtitles.english: Crying out, returning to dance, touching with my hands.

subtitles.original: 失敗したって学んでいく...
subtitles.english: Even if I fail, I'll keep learning...

subtitles.original: ...もうこのままずっと降りやまない 雨の世界だ
subtitles.english: ...In this world of rain that won't stop falling like this.

subtitles.original: 愛するしかない それしかない 気配じゃないから
subtitles.english: I have to love it, that's all there is, it's not just a presence.

subtitles.original: そう白紙になった 青春の何ページ目だったっけ
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's turned blank. Which page of my youth was it?

subtitles.original: 忘れ物思い出せないまま 忘れそう
subtitles.english: Unable to remember what I've forgotten, I'm about to forget.

subtitles.original: ああ... このままじゃ
subtitles.english: Ah... if it stays like this...

subtitles.original: 風の形見えない 見えないよ あなただって
subtitles.english: The shape of the wind is invisible, invisible, even to you.

subtitles.original: あなただって同じ じっとしていられない 動き
subtitles.english: You're the same, unable to stay still, this movement...

subtitles.original: 出すよ この身かけて
subtitles.english: ...will start, risking this life.

subtitles.original: 零さないよう 舞い踊って しょうがないさ
subtitles.english: So as not to spill, dancing, it can't be helped.

subtitles.original: ねえ このままずっと降りやまない 雨の世界だ
subtitles.english: Hey, in this world of rain that won't stop falling like this.

subtitles.original: もう寂しくない 人はなれる 生き物だから
subtitles.english: I'm not lonely anymore, because humans are creatures that can adapt.

subtitles.original: そう白紙になった 青春の何ページ目だったっけ
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's turned blank. Which page of my youth was it?

subtitles.original: 今君に会いたいと涙 こらえて
subtitles.english: I want to see you now, holding back my tears.

subtitles.original: さよならだって さよならなんて 認めたくないけど
subtitles.english: Even if it's a goodbye, I don't want to accept it, but...

subtitles.original: 雨上がりのこの世界が 眩しいから
subtitles.english: ...this world after the rain is just so bright.

subtitles.original: もう帰らない 振り返らない 思い出とともに
subtitles.english: I won't go back, I won't look back, together with my memories.

subtitles.original: 新しい風に煽られ
subtitles.english: Buffeted by a new wind,

subtitles.original: そしてまた 君に会いたいと願い 駆けていく
subtitles.english: ...and once again, wishing to see you, I run.

subtitles.original: 駆けていく
subtitles.english: I run.

subtitles.original: 声聴かせてください！
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voices!

subtitles.original: 切らさないで 指深いほどに
subtitles.english: Don't let it end, the deeper the fingers go,

subtitles.original: 隠せない どこにいようが
subtitles.english: ...the more it can't be hidden, no matter where I am.

subtitles.original: 輝くものしか ここにない
subtitles.english: There's nothing here but things that shine.

subtitles.original: 日々は一進一退 落ち着かない
subtitles.english: Days are a series of ups and downs, restless.

subtitles.original: 絶えない傷でもギリギリ耐えて
subtitles.english: Even with endless wounds, barely enduring...

subtitles.original: 謳歌しな
subtitles.english: ...just enjoy it.

subtitles.original: いつかきっとじゃない 今に刺激はない
subtitles.english: It's not 'someday surely', there's no excitement in the 'now'.

subtitles.original: 確かなビートが示している上へ
subtitles.english: A certain beat is pointing upwards.

subtitles.original: 行けよ
subtitles.english: Go!

subtitles.original: 咲かせ 咲かせよ 咲かせ切るまで
subtitles.english: Bloom, let it bloom, until it blooms fully.

subtitles.original: 澄み切る闇は 無限の木霊達
subtitles.english: The clear darkness is filled with infinite echoes.

subtitles.original: 旅するのは理屈じゃないの
subtitles.english: Traveling is not about logic.

subtitles.original: 瞬く命よ 咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: Twinkling life, bloom in full glory.

subtitles.original: 殻にこもって 怯えぬ背に吹く
subtitles.english: Shutting yourself away, on a back that doesn't fear,

subtitles.original: 風はない 負けてたまるか
subtitles.english: ...there is no wind. I won't let myself lose.

subtitles.original: 開拓者達の 夢の跡
subtitles.english: The traces of pioneers' dreams.

subtitles.original: 自分に期待して何が悪い
subtitles.english: What's wrong with expecting things from yourself?

subtitles.original: 本当の敵も味方も己って
subtitles.english: Knowing that the true enemy and ally are yourself,

subtitles.original: ほら正解
subtitles.english: ...see, that's the answer.

subtitles.original: だから正気と狂気でギリギリ舞い
subtitles.english: So, dance on the edge of sanity and madness.

subtitles.original: 次から次へと過去に手を振って
subtitles.english: Waving goodbye to the past, one after another,

subtitles.original: 行けよ
subtitles.english: Go!

subtitles.original: 鳴らせ 鳴らせ 胸の...
subtitles.english: Let it ring, let it ring, the [sound] in your heart...
